description: Shows resource usage of Kubernetes pods.

targets.expr: sum by (namespace, label_component) (sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!="",instance=~"^$instance$",namespace=~"^$namespace$"}[1m])) by (pod_name, namespace) * on (pod_name) group_left(label_component) label_replace(kube_pod_labels{label_component!=""}, "pod_name", "$1", "pod", "(.*)")) * on (namespace ,label_component) group_right kube_service_labels

sum by (namespace, label_component) (sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{image!="",instance=~"^$instance$",namespace=~"^$namespace$"}) by (pod_name, namespace) * on (pod_name) group_left(label_component) label_replace(kube_pod_labels{label_component!=""}, "pod_name", "$1", "pod", "(.*)")) * on (namespace ,label_component) group_right kube_service_labels

sum by (namespace, label_component) (sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{image!="",instance=~"^$instance$",namespace=~"^$namespace$"}[1m])) by (pod_name, namespace) * on (pod_name) group_left(label_component) label_replace(kube_pod_labels{label_component!=""}, "pod_name", "$1", "pod", "(.*)")) * on (namespace ,label_component) group_right kube_service_labels

- sum by (namespace, label_component) (sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{image!="",instance=~"^$instance$",namespace=~"^$namespace$"}[1m])) by (pod_name, namespace) * on (pod_name) group_left(label_component) label_replace(kube_pod_labels{label_component!=""}, "pod_name", "$1", "pod", "(.*)")) * on (namespace ,label_component) group_right kube_service_labels

sum by (namespace, label_component) (sum(container_fs_usage_bytes{image!="",instance=~"^$instance$",namespace=~"^$namespace$"}) by (pod_name, namespace) * on (pod_name) group_left(label_component) label_replace(kube_pod_labels{label_component!=""}, "pod_name", "$1", "pod", "(.*)")) * on (namespace ,label_component) group_right kube_service_labels

title: Kubernetes Pod Resources
